short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the default omnibox (address bar) search to Asia Live Search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change default search engine to make Asia Live Search your search in Chrome browser address bar (omnibox).
To get a new search experience, you only need to install this extension and leave it as the default search in the address bar.

Terms of Use: https://asialivewallpaper.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://asialivewallpaper.com/privacy.html

By click on «Add to Chrome» button in the top right hand corner and installing the Asia Live Search extension, you are agreeing to install this extension, you are agreeing to our Privacy Policy, and you are agreeing to our Terms of Use.
